report.name: ree_syntheseLocale

dataSource.name: REE_SYNTHESE_LOCALE
dataSource.select: select D.MOISMENS MOISMENS, CA.THEORIQUE THEORIQUE, RA.CODSG CODSG, RA.CODSG ||' '|| SI.LIBDSG LIBDPG, RA.CODE_ACTIVITE CODE_ACTIVITE, RS.CODE_SCENARIO CODE_SCENARIO, RS.LIB_SCENARIO LIB_SCENARIO, RS.COMMENTAIRE COMMENTAIRE, NVL(SUM(B.BPMONTME),0) PROP_FOURN, NVL(SUM(B.BPMONTMO),0) PROP_CLI, NVL(SUM(B.BNMONT),0) NOTIFIE, NVL(SUM(B.ANMONT),0) ARBITRE, NVL(SUM(B.REESTIME),0) REESTIME, NVL(SUM(C.CUSAG),0) REALISE, DECODE(NVL(SUM(B.REESTIME),0),0,0,NVL(ROUND((NVL(SUM(C.CUSAG),0)/SUM(B.REESTIME))*100,1),0)) REAL_REESTIME, NVL(SUM(B.REESTIME),0)-NVL(SUM(C.CUSAG),0) RAF_BIP, NVL(pack_ree_synthese_locale.RAF_RESSOURCE(RA.CODSG,RA.CODE_ACTIVITE,RS.CODE_SCENARIO,D.MOISMENS),0) RAF_RESSOURCE, (NVL(SUM(B.REESTIME),0)-NVL(SUM(C.CUSAG),0))-NVL(pack_ree_synthese_locale.RAF_RESSOURCE(RA.CODSG,RA.CODE_ACTIVITE,RS.CODE_SCENARIO,D.MOISMENS),0) ECARTS, NVL(SUM(B.ANMONT),0)-NVL(SUM(B.REESTIME),0) LIGNE, (NVL(SUM(B.ANMONT),0)-NVL(SUM(B.REESTIME),0))+(NVL(SUM(B.REESTIME),0)-NVL(SUM(C.CUSAG),0))-NVL(pack_ree_synthese_locale.RAF_RESSOURCE(RA.CODSG,RA.CODE_ACTIVITE,RS.CODE_SCENARIO,D.MOISMENS),0) RESSOURCE from REE_ACTIVITES RA, REE_ACTIVITES_LIGNE_BIP RAL, BUDGET B, CONSOMME C, DATDEBEX D, REE_SCENARIOS RS, STRUCT_INFO SI, CALENDRIER CA where RA.CODSG>=pack_ree_synthese_locale.min_dpg(:P_param6) and RA.CODSG<=pack_ree_synthese_locale.max_dpg(:P_param6) and RA.CODSG=RAL.CODSG(+) and RA.CODE_ACTIVITE=RAL.CODE_ACTIVITE(+) and RA.TYPE='N' and SI.CODSG=RA.CODSG and RAL.PID=B.PID(+) and B.ANNEE(+)=:P_ANNEE and RAL.PID=C.PID(+) and C.ANNEE(+)=:P_ANNEE and RA.CODSG=RS.CODSG and UPPER(RS.CODE_SCENARIO) like UPPER(pack_ree_synthese_locale.code_scenario(:P_param7)) and UPPER(RS.OFFICIEL) like UPPER(pack_ree_synthese_locale.officiel(:P_param7)) and CA.CALANMOIS=D.MOISMENS GROUP BY RA.CODSG,RA.CODE_ACTIVITE,SI.CODSG,SI.LIBDSG,MOISMENS,RS.CODE_SCENARIO,RS.LIB_SCENARIO,RS.COMMENTAIRE,THEORIQUE;

dataDescriptor.expression: NVL ( SUM ( B.ANMONT ) , 0 ) - NVL ( SUM ( B.REESTIME ) , 0 )

dataItem.name: RESSOURCE
dataItem.defaultLabel: B Anmont B Reestime Nvl Sum B

dataDescriptor.expression: ( NVL ( SUM ( B.ANMONT ) , 0 ) - NVL ( SUM ( B.REESTIME ) , 0 ) ) + ( NVL ( SUM ( B.REESTIME ) , 0 ) - NVL ( SUM ( C.CUSAG ) , 0 ) ) - NVL ( pack_ree_synthese_locale.RAF_RESSOURCE ( RA.CODSG , RA.CODE_ACTIVITE , RS.CODE_SCENARIO , D.MOISMENS ) , 0 )
DECODE ( NVL ( SUM ( B.REESTIME ) , 0 ) , 0 , 0 , NVL ( ROUND ( ( NVL ( SUM ( C.CUSAG ) , 0 ) / SUM ( B.REESTIME ) ) * 100 , 1 ) , 0 ) )
NVL ( SUM ( B.REESTIME ) , 0 ) - NVL ( SUM ( C.CUSAG ) , 0 )
NVL ( pack_ree_synthese_locale.RAF_RESSOURCE ( RA.CODSG , RA.CODE_ACTIVITE , RS.CODE_SCENARIO , D.MOISMENS ) , 0 )
( NVL ( SUM ( B.REESTIME ) , 0 ) - NVL ( SUM ( C.CUSAG ) , 0 ) ) - NVL ( pack_ree_synthese_locale.RAF_RESSOURCE ( RA.CODSG , RA.CODE_ACTIVITE , RS.CODE_SCENARIO , D.MOISMENS ) , 0 )

textSegment.string: Valeur du dernier traitement de la BIP

function.name: cf_1formula0013
cf_1formula
afterpform
